Introduction
This topic contains instructions for handling a beneficiary's failure to return a
VA Form 21-0538
or
VA Form 21P-0537
, including
how ROs are alerted that a beneficiary has failed to return
VA Form 21-0538
or
VA Form 21P-0537
processing a(n)
EP 130 that was generated because a Veteran failed to return
VA Form 21-0538
unsigned and/or incomplete
VA Form 21-0538
VA Form 21-0538
that does not show the date of the event that necessitates removal of a former dependent(s) from a Veteran’s award
, and

VA Form 21P-0537
, and
handling cases in which a Veteran with a running apportionment fails to return
VA Form 21-0538
.
